statements: SELECT * FROM course_prerequisites;
SELECT course_name, prerequisite_course_id FROM course_prerequisites WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM course_prerequisites WHERE prerequisite_course_id = 201;
SELECT * FROM course_prerequisites WHERE course_id > 100;
SELECT course_id, course_name, prerequisite_course_id FROM course_prerequisites ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_prerequisites WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name FROM course_prerequisites WHERE prerequisite_course_id = 3 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM course_prerequisites WHERE prerequisite_course_id IN (2, 4) AND course_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT DISTINCT course_id, course_name FROM course_prerequisites WHERE prerequisite_course_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM course_prerequisites WHERE course_name ILIKE 'Intro%';
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM Course WHERE credit_hours >= 3;
SELECT course_name, department FROM Course ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours, department FROM Course WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
SELECT course_name, department FROM Course WHERE credit_hours BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM Course WHERE credit_hours > 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC, course_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, department FROM Course WHERE department = 'Computer Science' ORDER BY course_name LIMIT 5;
SELECT course_id, course_name, credit_hours, department FROM Course INNER JOIN Prerequisite ON Course.course_id = Prerequisite.course_id WHERE Prerequisite.prerequisite_id = 101;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM Course WHERE credit_hours BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY credit_hours DESC;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(prerequisite_id) AS num_prerequisites FROM Prerequisite GROUP BY course_id HAVING num_prerequisites > 2 ORDER BY num_prerequisites DESC;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM courses WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT prerequisite_id, course_id, prerequisite_course_id FROM prerequisites ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT course_id, course_name, credit_hours FROM courses WHERE credit_hours <= 2;
SELECT course_id, course_name, credit_hours FROM courses WHERE credit_hours > 3 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, credit_hours FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE 'Math%';
SELECT courses.course_id, course_name, credit_hours, prerequisite_course_id FROM courses JOIN prerequisites ON courses.course_id = prerequisites.course_id;
SELECT course_id, course_name, credit_hours FROM courses WHERE course_id = 'abcdefg-1234-hijk-5678';
SELECT courses.course_id, course_name, credit_hours, required_course_id FROM courses JOIN requirements ON courses.course_id = requirements.course_id ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Course_Prerequisites;
SELECT course_name, prerequisite_course_id, course_id FROM Course_Prerequisites;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM Course_Details WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Course_Prerequisites WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT course_id, course_name, prerequisite_course_id FROM Course_Prerequisites ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Course_Prerequisites ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, prerequisite_course_id FROM Course_Prerequisites WHERE prerequisite_course_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT course_id, course_name, credit_hours FROM Course_Details WHERE credit_hours > 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT requirement_name, course_id FROM Course_Requirements WHERE requirement_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT c.course_name, cr.requirement_name FROM Course_Details c JOIN Course_Requirements cr ON c.course_id = cr.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM Course;
SELECT * FROM Prerequisite WHERE prerequisite_course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name FROM Course WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Course ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM Course WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT c.course_name, cs.semester FROM Course c JOIN CourseSchedule cs ON c.course_id = cs.course_id WHERE cs.year = 2022;
SELECT cr.requirement_name, c.course_name FROM Course c JOIN CourseRequirement cr ON c.course_id = cr.course_id;
SELECT cr.requirement_name, c.course_name, p.prerequisite_course_id FROM Course c JOIN CourseRequirement cr ON c.course_id = cr.course_id JOIN Prerequisite p ON c.course_id = p.course_id;
